property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT (language_code || '_' || country_code) AS locale_code, language_name FROM language

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT resource_cd , value1 FROM resources where category_cd='systemSettings'

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT resource_cd , value1 FROM resources where category_cd='clThemeDefault'

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT resource_cd , value2 FROM resources where category_cd='clDisplayType'

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT value1 FROM resources where category_cd='clPageSize' order by resource_cd ASC

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT value1, value2 FROM resources where category_cd='clTableSetting'

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT value1, value2 FROM resources WHERE category_cd = 'clDefaultType' order by value2

entry.value: S. Georgia and S. Sandwich Isls.
NATO (this was purged in 1996 - see hq.nato.int)

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT resource_cd , value1 FROM resources where category_cd='clImportSetting'

property.name: querySql
property.value: SELECT value2 , value1 FROM resources where category_cd='clBasetype'
